4gYTEXAneBg9oQHYWFyLyA.text: What a fantastic shop , the food is so fresh and tasty compared to the Starbucks and costas and Cafe Neros of this world! Doesn't even compare!  Am so thrilled I have a Pret next door instead of walking to the branch in Hanover St .  The food and coffee is amazing , the range of food is overwhelming and the coffee just perfect !  Porridge or croissant for breakfast , are always made in premises and very fresh .

fp1OKU-uhOegw6PKliABlA.text: Love this chain. It provided good food at a very reasonable cost as we toured the UK.   This location has the same quality food as all the others, but looses a star for often being out of stock. I don't mean being out of stock on one or two items, but bare shelves with maybe one or two sandwiches selections remaining. Seems they allow the shelves to almost run bare before they start prepping another round of inventory. This happened several times to us as we were staying across the street at the Hilton.   On our last morning, i was certain to beat the rush and arrived at the store 15 minutes after they opened to find they had NO sandwiches - hot or cold - on the shelves. I asked a staff member and I was told that, "Now that we are open, we should have them ready in about 30-45 minutes." What!?!?!?  Who waits until they are open to start stocking shelves?  Anyhow, good luck on the timing around this Pret a Manger location, but should you score a meal there, it will be as good as all the others!

Nm712dhlJpnzVnsYffTy3A.text: I knew "Pret a manger" from my visit in New York already and was very happy to find shops here. Great quality, taste and service! Thank you so much!

photos.caption: Photo of Pret a Manger - Old Town, Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Photo of Pret a Manger - Old Town, Edinburgh, United Kingdom
Photo of Pret a Manger - Old Town, Edinburgh, United Kingdom

8NYsP-nQvg9KmaJkiWpmrg.text: Grabbed chicken avocado sandwich and small vitamin volcano smoothie, so good, light, and tasty. Wish we had healthy options like this in the states... instead all our options are crap... affordable and quick makes this an easy choice with great variety, will return!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Pret a Manger - Old Town, Edinburgh, United Kingdom

U58LmOV8NZp6LcBDRmsBJQ.text: Always solid grab n go fresh food with some interesting items like here like coconut cream Chia seed cups, mango cups, hoisin duck wrap, macaroni and cheese with braised short rib, and even chocolate mousse. Everything we tried was delicious and a step above what we are used to with Pret A Manger in the US.

UTyjwtDidRz4W7ac7Y5XPw.text: I truly don't understand how a chain like this stays in business. Consistently fresh, delicious and healthy for nearly the price of McDonald's? I don't get it. God bless Pret a Manger.

N2vkI7WwS0wC6-dH7O93IQ.text: Good premade good but slow service. We got premade soup, wraps, sandwiches and fruit. The woman ringing us up was very slow. She did not inform me when she was done ringing me up or hand me a receipt so I was standing there until she made a hand gesture that my transaction was over.   The extra seating in the back is a large area. There is seating in the front of the cafe as well.   When we were here there was also a homeless man being escorted out of the cafe by two policemen. This cafe is in a good location off the royal mile!

0RUhFaocNEZUkBVEcbTa7w.text: Here and in their website says that they open 6:30 on weekdays, unfortunately it is a lie, today Friday I stood outside at 6:50 and it was closed with no personnel inside

xPbl_3CQMiRsBDlOgzVdBA.text: Best breakfest, stylish ambient, good coffee, low price for great quality and rich joize

wH0Vf2M6mCESwu9edV4Nfw.text: Awesome place to grab food quickly or sit and enjoy a Starbucks/Panera's environment! Its a chain but was able to eat under 10per meal and food selection is delicious! Think Panera but salad ,soups, sandwiches/wrapped all made up for the day in big coolers. You just grab what you want, also has free Wifi!

SJCrdNiZAYRwKGw03dQ79Q.text: Delicious!  Had the spicy chicken wrap and a sparkling apple drink.  Very hospitable service and love the selection of healthy options-something that's not always easy to find when traveling.  Thank you for a great experience!  Pret is my go to when traveling abroad here.
